name: market for waste paperboard, unsorted | waste paperboard, unsorted | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/22823/documentation

This is a market activity, representing a treatment mix. In the case of products needing treatment, market mixes are supplied by the activities treating the product in the geography defined by the market, and they supply the activities needing to treat the product, as they have generated it as a by-product in the Undefined processes (present as a negative input in system models). Transport to the treating facility or losses are also accounted in this type of markets, when relevant.;This is the market for  'waste paperboard, unsorted', in the geography of Switzerland.;This dataset represents the collection of 1 kg of 'waste paperboard, unsorted' (a source-segregated municipal solid waste fraction for recycling) from generating activities within the geography of Switzerland. The dataset starts with the disposal of 'waste paperboard, unsorted' at recycling containers or at collection points or at the curbside, and includes the local collection and the transportation to the sorting/recycling plant.

This market activity collects all activities providing treatment for its reference product within the same geography. The physical flow over this market starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'waste paperboard, unsorted' within the geography of this dataset, with the product ready for collection/transportation. No losses are considered during the collection and transportation.

A market for a material for treatment (wastes or recyclables) ends with the provision of treatment, i.e. a mix of treatment providers, to activities that generate the reference product as a waste/by-product. The physical flow over this activity ends with the delivery of 1 kg of 'waste paperboard, unsorted' to the activities treating this product. Transport is included.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Data mainly reflecting situation in Switzerland in 2012.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data represent the market activities of this product within Switzerland.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Average transport requirements used to deliver products within Switzerland.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The transport distance has been assumed based on industrial data representative for Switzerland in 2012.

exchanges.description: Value reported in Haupt et al. (2018)
